scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d db && sleep 3
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:reset && sleep 5 && npm run db:migrate
scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist
